mapper.insert: insert into oc_document (dno, writer, content, tag, image) values (oc_document_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{content}, #{tag}, #{image})
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from oc_reply where dno = #{dno}
mapper.update: update oc_user set user_image = #{user_image} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from(select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from oc_document, oc_user where writer IN (select sender from oc_friend_rel where receiver = #{user_id} union select receiver from oc_friend_rel where sender = #{user_id} union select user_id from oc_user where user_id = #{user_id} ) and oc_document.writer=oc_user.user_id order by writedate desc)

select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from( select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from oc_document, oc_user where writer = #{user_id} and oc_document.writer=oc_user.user_id order by writedate desc )
select count(*) cnt from oc_document where writer = #{user_id}

select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from( select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from oc_document, oc_user where dno=#{dno} and oc_document.writer=oc_user.user_id)
